Text: Thanks Hero, can always count on you.. Tried to get this via BM site but all the d-loads times out, and the so-called torrent they had wasn't working..

I have a few questions if you do not mind.

1. Does this require the Source Engine SDK 2007 be installed to work? Or does this have it's own copy included?

2. Will this interfere with or use a copy of Steam already installed?

So far, I have installed the game via official channels. I am just looking for a way to reintroduce the game to those playing a no-Steam system.

Thank you in advance.
